links.title: Apple 'Deeply Apologetic' Over Account Hacks in China
links.description: Apple apologized over the hacking of some Chinese accounts in phishing scams, almost a week after it emerged that stolen Apple IDs had been used to swipe customer funds.

links.title: Is it safe yet?
links.description: Free After-hours Update: What a difference a few days makes. Last week the market was collapsing. This week we recovered a big chunk of those losses and things feel significantly better. The only question is if this rebound is the real deal, or just a false bottom on our way lower.
